item.title: Spirit tree, i got ice gloves! Tele me!
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:12, topic:161838”][quote author=X-J-K-X link=topic=220208.msg1908539#msg1908539 date=1196553742]

case 1295: if (objectX == 2764 && objectY == 2916) { if(playerEquipment[playerGloves] == 1580) { sendMessage("Your Ice Gloves activate the tree."); teleportToX = 2838; teleportToY = 3803; heightLevel = 1; } else if(playerEquipment[playerGloves] != 1580) { sendMessage("Tree is not interested in talking right now.."); } break;
[/quote]
Oh lmao… I didn’t even scan the case…[/quote]

Owned ur ass was being sarcastic when he said you were smart.
Your signature is misleading, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Spirit tree, i got ice gloves! Tele me!

item.description:
@Paintball199 wrote:

some people realy dont know some basic coding.

case 1295:
if(objectX == 2764 && objectY == 2916)
{
if(playerEquipment[playerHands] == 1580) {
sendMessage("You damn motherfucker");
teleportToX = 2838;
teleportToY = 3803;
heightLevel = 1;
} else {
sendMessage("Tree is a bitch so dont talk asshole.");
}
}
break;

{
if(playerEquipment[playerGloves] == 1580){
sendMessage("Your Ice Gloves activate the tree.");
teleportToX = 2838;
teleportToY = 3803;
heightLevel = 1;
} else {
sendMessage("Tree is not interested in talking right now..");
}
}
break;

item.title: Spirit tree, i got ice gloves! Tele me!
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

So, i want to make a spirit tree(1295) tele me when i’m wearing ice gloves(1580).
Could some nice person give me the code for it?
Tried it like this:

case 1295: if (objectX == 2764 && objectY == 2916) { if(playerEquipment[playerGloves] == 1580) sendMessage("Your Ice Gloves activate the tree."); teleportToX = 2838; teleportToY = 3803; heightLevel = 1; } else { sendMessage("Tree is not interested in talking right now.."); break;
But theres propably something wrong, as it gives errors when compiling.
